fields.description:
two ways i see we could do this
1) use doesn't see text, so like how standard web dropdown works, eg type 'Ire' and it magically goes to Ireland.
2) put in a search field at the top of the select.

would need to consider what the long term goal of the rich select is. the first is the best if this was the only requirement. however it may be that the rich select gets a revamp and the second option might be better in a greater revamp.
